rooms.description: North-facing entrance with Vastu-compliant reception area and foyer. Features a transitional space with ample natural light from the north, providing an inviting welcome.
Open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen and dining space. Features comfortable seating arrangements, traditional Kerala-style decor, and adequate natural lighting.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Equipped with modern amenities while retaining traditional elements like wooden fixtures and tiled surfaces.
Dedicated dining space within the living area. Designed for flexibility in seating and hosting gatherings.
A quiet, well-lit library space located near the living area. Designed for reading and study with comfortable seating and adjustable lighting.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door adhering to Vastu principles. Large, inviting threshold with decorative arches.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a dedicated balcony offering views of the landscape. Incorporates traditional Kerala architectural elements and ample natural lighting.
Second bedroom with its own balcony for personal outdoor space. Emphasizes privacy and serenity.
Bathroom shared between the two bedrooms, designed with efficient space utilization and traditional finishes.

openings.description: Balcony adjoining bedroom1 providing an open view and fresh air.
Balcony adjoining bedroom2 offering outdoor space for relaxation.
